NK080(wu)018:1: // sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba dbang gi gal po bzhugs //
NK080(wu)018:2: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK080(wu)018:3: dad brtson ldan pa'i slob ma yis //
NK080(wu)018:4: ro mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru //
NK080(wu)018:5: nus dang phan pa'i dbang thob nas //
NK080(wu)018:6: brtul shugs ldan pa'i bu mchog la //
NK080(wu)018:7: ye shes rang gnas rdzogs bya'i phyir //
NK080(wu)018:8: sor bzhi 'am 'dzub gang tshad ldan la //
NK080(wu)018:9: nyi shu rtsa lngas rab mnyams te //
NK080(wu)018:10: gdan dang phyag rgya yi ge sogs //
NK080(wu)018:11: rgyud bzhin tshad ldan mkhas pas slob //
NK080(wu)018:12: snod ldan sngon nas shes bya //
NK080(wu)018:13: bcu drug nyi shu lnga gnyis tshad //
NK080(wu)018:14: yon tan bcu gsum rab ldan zhing //
NK080(wu)018:15: mnyen drang skye ring sems ma'i tshul //
NK080(wu)018:16: gsang ba'i gter du ming gis bzung //
NK080(wu)018:17: 'o ma spos chus mgo lus bkru //
NK080(wu)018:18: tsan dan gur gum a ka ru //
NK080(wu)018:19: gon pan dza ti shing tsha yis //
NK080(wu)018:20: dri zhim ngad ldan chas kyis barlunga //
NK080(wu)018:21: gsal ldan ma'am byin rlabs la //
NK080(wu)018:22: kha snying pad+ma la sogs pa //
NK080(wu)018:23: gsang yum lnga dang khro mo bzhi //
NK080(wu)018:24: dbyibs dang kha dog gsal bar bya //
NK080(wu)018:25: rang gi mchod pa legs spyar ba //
NK080(wu)018:26: yum dang 'jo ma sems ma yis //
NK080(wu)018:27: ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod //
NK080(wu)018:28: zad med gter la longs spyod phyir //
NK080(wu)018:29: rin chen snyim pa bkang nas su //
NK080(wu)018:30: rdo rje gtso bo khyod la 'dud //
NK080(wu)018:31: thar lam chen po bdag 'dod de //
NK080(wu)018:32: de nyid dbang dang dam tshig dang //
NK080(wu)018:33: mgon po dpa' bo skyabs songs shig /theg chen khang bar bzhug pa dang //
NK080(wu)018:34: mkhyen rabs ye shes bdag la gsol //
NK080(wu)018:35: bu 'dir myur shog ci bde bar //
NK080(wu)018:36: las spyod rim par 'gro ba dang //
NK080(wu)018:37: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung //
NK080(wu)018:38: rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen la //
NK080(wu)018:39: dmigs pa med par gnas phyir du //
NK080(wu)018:40: ser sna spangs pa'i dang yid kyis //
NK080(wu)018:41: gtong zhing rang sems brtan par zung //
NK080(wu)018:42: ye shes rang gnas rdzogs dbang spyin //
NK080(wu)018:43: 'dod pa'i dngos spangs rol pa yi //
NK080(wu)018:44: phyag rgya bzhi dag gyur pa dang //
NK080(wu)018:45: rgyal ba'i phyag rgya lnga ldan pas //
NK080(wu)018:47: dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod //
NK080(wu)018:48: shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las //
NK080(wu)018:49: bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyu //
NK080(wu)018:50: rdo rje lam nas pad+mora skyil //
NK080(wu)018:51: mkha' dang bzlog pa'i bde ba yis //
NK080(wu)018:52: sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la //
NK080(wu)018:53: dges mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim //
NK080(wu)018:54: sgo 'byed bde bas gyen du sgyil //
NK080(wu)018:55: de nas dbang phyug chen po de //
NK080(wu)018:56: mi 'gyur sgron ma sku bskyod cing //
NK080(wu)018:57: sems kyi thig le sgo phye ste //
NK080(wu)018:58: tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs bzhes nas //
NK080(wu)018:59: go 'byed rdo rje'i ljags brkyang ste //
NK080(wu)018:60: bsgrub pa nyi zla'i snying po de //
NK080(wu)018:61: dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i lce yis blang //
NK080(wu)018:62: rtse nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor bsgyur //
NK080(wu)018:63: tshangs pa'i bsgo ba 'di gsungs so //
NK080(wu)018:64: h+aum ni rgyal ba kun gyi bla //
NK080(wu)018:65: thig le byang chub sems chen po //
NK080(wu)018:66: nga ni khro rgyal kun gyi rje //
NK080(wu)018:67: ye shes rol pa'i 'byung gnas gter //
NK080(wu)018:68: nga ni spyi dpal bla na med //
NK080(wu)018:69: skyon bral thabs kyi rgyal po yin //
NK080(wu)018:70: sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu //
NK080(wu)018:71: khyod kyi lce la phab pa 'di //
NK080(wu)018:72: snying gi dkyil du bzung bar bya'o //
NK080(wu)018:73: rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad //
NK080(wu)018:74: rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs mchog zung //
NK080(wu)018:75: sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yin //
NK080(wu)018:76: byang chub sems dang mnyam pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)018:77: byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi mchog gnas yin //
NK080(wu)018:78: rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad //
NK080(wu)018:79: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi //
NK080(wu)018:80: bstan pa phyi nang zab mo kun //
NK080(wu)018:81: sems kyi dkyil du bsdus nas kyang //
NK080(wu)018:82: rdo rje lce yi sgo phye ste //
NK080(wu)018:83: bdud rtsi sman mchog dam pa 'dis //
NK080(wu)018:84: dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byes //
NK080(wu)018:85: sems kyi thig le'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK080(wu)018:86: zhi khro 'bar ba'i sku bsgoms la //
NK080(wu)018:87: srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur cig /dbang can thams cad bkod bar byos //
NK080(wu)018:88: skye 'gro kun la snying brtse yi //
NK080(wu)018:90: dug gsum rtsa ba gcod par byos /phyi nang snod
NK080(wu)018:91: bcud rnam par dag /rnam dag chen po nyid kyi
NK080(wu)018:92: lam // byed spyod thams cad tshogs gnyis rdzogs //
NK080(wu)018:93: 'gro don bde ba chen po pad+ma'i dbyings //
NK080(wu)018:94: sems kyi chu 'di btung bar bya'o //
NK080(wu)018:95: rnal 'byor chen po'i dam du bzung //
NK080(wu)018:96: nyungs kar tshad tsam rdo rje sems //
NK080(wu)018:97: gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs te //
NK080(wu)018:98: h+aum nyid rig pos 'tshams sbyor te //
NK080(wu)018:99: h+aum thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings //
NK080(wu)018:100: dge sdig las kyis ma bcos shing //
NK080(wu)018:101: bsgoms shing bsgrubs pas mi 'byang ba'i //
NK080(wu)018:102: rnam dag sems kyi rin chen gter //
NK080(wu)018:103: rdo rje snying po ye shes kyis //
NK080(wu)018:104: khro rgyal kun gyi gtsor gyur cig /sh+r+ai ma h+aa su kha badz+ra bo d+hi h+aum ho //
NK080(wu)018:105: rdo rje snying khar legs bzung la //
NK080(wu)018:106: bden pa'i tshig gis 'di skad bsgo //
NK080(wu)018:108: ma rtsal phyin pas bde ba'i mchog /ma bltas gsal bas ye shes spyan //
NK080(wu)018:109: gong na med pas kun gyi rje //
NK080(wu)018:110: ye shes rang gnas brdal ba la //
NK080(wu)018:111: mi 'gyur g.yung drung sa thob shog /
NK080(wu)018:112: ma h+aa g+ha ya brum dz+ny+aa na ma d+ha la
NK080(wu)018:113: dz+ny+aa na g+hu ya si ti swa b+ha b+aa ad+ma
NK080(wu)018:114: ko & ham / ye shes rang gnas su 'dod pas //
NK080(wu)018:115: thig le mtshan ldan legs rnyed nas //
NK080(wu)018:116: khrus dang mdzes par dbul bar bya //
NK080(wu)018:117: ye shes rang gnas rgyal pos byin brlabs te //
NK080(wu)018:118: rdo rje zla ba'i 'od zer gyis //
NK080(wu)018:119: rdo rje dbyings phyug reg byas te //
NK080(wu)018:120: rin chen snod du mdzes pa'i dkyil //
NK080(wu)018:121: rang gi sems nyid nyungs kar bsam //
NK080(wu)018:122: phab pas thig le dbang bskur te //
NK080(wu)018:123: g.yas g.yon gung mo rin chen bcing //
NK080(wu)018:124: bde ba chen po chos kyi sku //
NK080(wu)018:125: shes rab thabs kyi rdzogs par 'gyur //
NK080(wu)018:126: 'di dang skye ba thams cad du //
NK080(wu)018:127: dngos grub bde 'di ma spongs shig /rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK080(wu)018:128: rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya khyod las byung //
NK080(wu)018:129: spangs na rdo rje dbyings phyug rtsa //
NK080(wu)018:130: skug dang bsdam pa ma shes na //
NK080(wu)018:131: rdo rje bskal pa mtha' klas par //
NK080(wu)018:132: chos sku thob par mi 'gyur ro //
NK080(wu)018:133: gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni //
NK080(wu)018:134: lta ba dman la bstan byas na //
NK080(wu)018:135: dus min par ni srog zad nas //
NK080(wu)018:137: khab len gyis ni lcags bsdud ltar //
NK080(wu)018:138: mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par //
NK080(wu)018:139: skal bar ngan song myong bar 'gyur //
NK080(wu)018:140: de bas shin tu gsang bar bya //
NK080(wu)018:141: de skad gsang ba'i las gnyer gtad //
NK080(wu)018:142: de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des //
NK080(wu)018:143: ye shes rang gnas rdzogs bya'i phyir //
NK080(wu)018:144: dgug dang bkugs pa'i thabs 'di bstan //
NK080(wu)018:145: bde chen bzang po'i mtshan ldan pa //
NK080(wu)018:146: rang bzhin gnas pa'i chos sku ste //
NK080(wu)018:147: bcu drug thabs dang shes rab gnyis //
NK080(wu)018:148: longs spyod rdzogs sku chig cha yis //
NK080(wu)018:149: gnas la med par rol zhes bshad //
NK080(wu)018:150: chos nyid thabs dang shes rab la //
NK080(wu)018:151: rtsa bzhi 'od bzhi sa bon drug /mdor bsdus snying po chos kyi sku //
NK080(wu)018:152: de phyir chos kyi 'khor lo yi //
NK080(wu)018:153: dur khrod brgyad po kun bsdus pa'o //
NK080(wu)018:154: rtsa drug gcig dang bzhir gyes pa //
NK080(wu)018:155: khams gsum khyab pas sprul sku'o //
NK080(wu)018:156: me dang rdo rje dbyings phyug gnyis //
NK080(wu)018:157: mnyam du gnas pas drag por bshad //
NK080(wu)018:158: rlung ni dgug pa'i gzhung dbyings te //
NK080(wu)018:159: sa bon yang gis g.yo byed de //
NK080(wu)018:160: las ni mthur du sel ba ste //
NK080(wu)018:161: bud med rgyud la gtum mo bshad //
NK080(wu)018:162: zla ba bskyang pa'i thig le gnyis //
NK080(wu)018:163: chos la thig le bskul ba bzhin //
NK080(wu)018:164: de sogs mang po bkug pa kun //
NK080(wu)018:165: rdzogs pa'i bskyed pas bla mas gsungs //
NK080(wu)018:166: rang bzhin thig le mtshan rdzogs pa //
NK080(wu)018:167: yi ge med par byin brlabs pa //
NK080(wu)018:168: dbyings phyug bskul ba'i gar nyid kyis //
NK080(wu)018:169: snang ba thob par gyur pa na //
NK080(wu)018:170: thabs dang shes rab gang yin sku //
NK080(wu)018:171: bskug dang rlung phyed phyi nang can //
NK080(wu)018:172: gsang snod gsang sgo bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis //
NK080(wu)018:173: mi rtogs dang po thob par bshad //
NK080(wu)018:174: dang po'i sa la reg pa nus //
NK080(wu)018:175: de phyir rdzogs pa'i yi ge med //
NK080(wu)018:176: chos sku thob par the tshoms med //
NK080(wu)018:177: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan kun //
NK080(wu)018:179: gsang dbang pad+mara ldan gyur na //
NK080(wu)018:180: chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su //
NK080(wu)018:181: pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs //
NK080(wu)018:182: sa bcu rim gyis bgrod med rdzogs //
NK080(wu)018:183: kun tu 'od gsal pad+ma spyan yang rdzogs //
NK080(wu)018:184: thabs dang shes rab sa yang rdzogs //
NK080(wu)018:185: yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan //
NK080(wu)018:186: shes rab bla med yang dag rdzogs //
NK080(wu)018:187: bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs //
NK080(wu)018:189: yengs pa med par zhugs byas te //
NK080(wu)018:190: brtson 'grus yu ba bcad pa des //
NK080(wu)018:191: gdon mi za bar 'grus ces gsungs //
NK080(wu)018:192: dbang bskur gnang ba gang thob pa //
NK080(wu)018:193: dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras //
NK080(wu)018:194: 'bras bu mngon du ma smin kyang //
NK080(wu)018:195: tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs //
NK080(wu)018:196: ngan song thams cad med pa dang //
NK080(wu)018:197: mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur //
NK080(wu)018:198: 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor //
NK080(wu)018:199: rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba dbang gi gal po rdzogs so //
NK080(wu)018:200: bde legs nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur cig /dbang gi gal po'i 'grel pa bzhugs /
NK080(wu)018:201: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK080(wu)018:202: chos kun sems su bcom pas ye shes ye nas ldan /
NK080(wu)018:203: tshig gi mtha' las 'das kyang yon tan dpal du shar /
NK080(wu)018:204: kun tu sgrib g.yogs bral bas spong len ngang gis med /
NK080(wu)018:205: rang bzhin gnas pa'i blo de rtogs pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK080(wu)018:206: de la rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sgor zhugs te dad pas mos pa dang /
NK080(wu)018:207: brtson 'grus kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed nus pa'i slob bus /
NK080(wu)018:208: dang por gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen por /
NK080(wu)018:210: nus pa'i dbang lnga thob nas bya ste /
NK080(wu)018:211: de nas rigs pa'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pa'i slob
NK080(wu)018:212: bu khri'i nang nas gcig tsam 'byung srid pa'i don
NK080(wu)018:213: du / gsang ba'i dbang dang ye shes rang gnas kyi dbang bskur ba'i gal po'i mdor bsdus te //
NK080(wu)018:214: de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pa'i slob bu de grol bar bya'o //
NK080(wu)018:215: de la phyag btsal ba dang /
NK080(wu)018:216: rgyus tshig lnga'i 'bru sngar bcom zin to //
NK080(wu)018:217: sor bzhi zhes pa rgyud las smos te /
NK080(wu)018:218: gser ram shing tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i man+dala sor bzhi'am /
NK080(wu)018:220: sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga dang /
NK080(wu)018:222: bdud rtsi lnga byang chub sems kyi 'de khur byas te snyoms par byugs la /
NK080(wu)018:223: der rig pas sa bcad de byang chub sems kyi spyin byas pa'i tshon rtsis /
NK080(wu)018:224: sran tsan ka slebs pa tsam gyi dang ma la /
NK080(wu)018:225: sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla'i steng du /
NK080(wu)018:226: lha so so'i phyag rgya til 'bru slebs pa tsam du bri /
NK080(wu)018:227: gal te de ltar ma grub na /
NK080(wu)018:228: yum gyi mkha' la sbyor ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor tshad gong ma bzhin du rig pas bslab po //
NK080(wu)018:229: blo dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis /
NK080(wu)018:230: de'i sngon nas brtsal ba gang zhe na /
NK080(wu)018:233: lo grangs bcu gnyis sam nyi shu rtsa gnyis sam rtsa lnga lon pa ste /
NK080(wu)018:234: de las bla 'og tu ma gsungs so //
NK080(wu)018:235: de la lus kyi yon tan gsum ni /
NK080(wu)018:239: ngag gi yon tan gsum la /
NK080(wu)018:240: smra ba nyung la brdzun spangs pa dang /
NK080(wu)018:242: skad dang pa gzhon nu ltar snyan pa'o //
NK080(wu)018:243: sems kyi yon tan gsum ni /
NK080(wu)018:244: blo rno ba dad pa che ba /
NK080(wu)018:246: spyod lam gyi yon tan gsum ni /
NK080(wu)018:250: gsang ba'i yon tan bka' blo bde ba /
NK080(wu)018:251: ji ltar yang sbyar tu btub pa /
NK080(wu)018:252: de lta bu' yum sems ma'i cha byad can de ming gis med du mi rung ste /
NK080(wu)018:253: 'di med par dngos grub 'byung du re ba ni /
NK080(wu)018:254: dper na sa gzhi med par 'bras bu skye bar 'dod pa dang 'dra'o //
NK080(wu)018:255: des na yi ge bzhin khrus dag par bya /
NK080(wu)018:256: de nas yi ge las byung ba'i spos dang til mar bsres te lus byug pa dang /
NK080(wu)018:257: yi ge mi spos phye ma dang /
NK080(wu)018:258: sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i ril bu rgya shug gi 'bras bu tsam byas te /
NK080(wu)018:259: 'di ni kha'i ngang bskyed pa'i thabs dam pa'o //
NK080(wu)018:260: de nas rna cha dang mgul do la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs dang /
NK080(wu)018:261: ras pi par ta la sogs pa'i chas kyis mdzes par bya'o //
NK080(wu)018:262: de nas stan la bzhag la mchod pa yang bshams te /
NK080(wu)018:264: ting nge 'dzin dad ldan pa cig yin na /
NK080(wu)018:265: rang gi gtso bo dang dus mnyam du byin gyis rlab po //
NK080(wu)018:267: gtso bos byin gyis rlab pa ji ltar bya zhe na /
NK080(wu)018:268: bdag gi yum du legs par bskyod la /
NK080(wu)018:269: de'i lag pa g.yas pa la gzhan gyi mi thub ma /
NK080(wu)018:270: g.yon pa la ro langs ma /
NK080(wu)018:272: phyi'i pad+ma la ral cig ma dgong //
NK080(wu)018:273: de'i spyi bor las kun tu bzang mo bskyed /
NK080(wu)018:274: am las lce la gos dkar mo //
NK080(wu)018:275: snying khar h+aum las sangs rgyas spyan /
NK080(wu)018:276: lte bar sa las ma ma k+ai /nang gi pad+ma la ha las dam tshig sgrol ma /
NK080(wu)018:277: de rnams sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams kyis legs par gsal bar bya'o //
NK080(wu)018:278: de nas rgyal ba bzhi bcu zhe gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang /
NK080(wu)018:280: rang gi mchod pa kun gyis kyang mchod te /
NK080(wu)018:281: de nas mkha' las rigs so so'i yum dang /
NK080(wu)018:282: 'jo sgeg dang bcas pa'i sems ma brgyad rnams byang chub sems las spros te /
NK080(wu)018:283: bsam pa dang bcas nas mchod do //
NK080(wu)018:284: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thob par
NK080(wu)018:285: 'dod pa'i slob bus khrus byas nas mig bkab la
NK080(wu)018:286: gser dang bed+aur+ya la sogs pa rin po che phangs
NK080(wu)018:289: phang gi dkyil 'khor la sems gtad de /
NK080(wu)018:290: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod par gsol ba btab te /
NK080(wu)018:291: yi ge'i 'bru ni ma bcom mo //
NK080(wu)018:292: de nas phang gi dkyil 'khor la gtor ro //
NK080(wu)018:293: de nas slob dpon gyi chos brgyad kyi phyogs gnyis
NK080(wu)018:294: spangs pa'i sems kyis slob bu'i lag pa g.yon pa
NK080(wu)018:296: bu 'dir shog cig ces pa'i gsang ba'i tshig gis
NK080(wu)018:297: drangs te g.yas su bzhag /rang gi lhar bskyed cing
NK080(wu)018:299: nye ba dang ring ba spangs te bzhag go /de
NK080(wu)018:300: nas bdud rtsi btab pa 'i yol bas bcad de
NK080(wu)018:301: / slob dpon gyis bdag nyid lhar bsgoms la /
NK080(wu)018:302: yum dang mthun pa'i gnas su rigs lnga dang /
NK080(wu)018:303: khro bo bzhi yang sgoms la /
NK080(wu)018:304: dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis stong
NK080(wu)018:305: gsum thams cad nyungs 'bru gcig tu tshud pa mdzad
NK080(wu)018:306: pa ltar / mkha'i rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i rtsal bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis tshang bar bkod pa der /
NK080(wu)018:307: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa /
NK080(wu)018:308: ril spyan drangs la bstim mo //
NK080(wu)018:309: de nas thig le nyid dam skyes pas phung po
NK080(wu)018:310: dang khams dang skye mched du ma grub par shes
NK080(wu)018:311: na / sems can lta bu'i 'dod pa'i dngos po su la ldang ste /
NK080(wu)018:312: mi ldang ba'i sems kyis rol bar bya'o //
NK080(wu)018:313: de'i tshe rig pas mkha'i sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhin du ma skyes par shes pas /
NK080(wu)018:314: yi ge h+aum dang phata gnyis 'du 'bras med par
NK080(wu)018:315: rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa'i ye shes skye ba
NK080(wu)018:316: dang // 'og nas 'byung bas 'gug par bya ste /
NK080(wu)018:318: gnas der rgya mtsho tsam bskyil zhing bzhag pas /
NK080(wu)018:319: de kho na rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa'i mchod pa yin pas /
NK080(wu)018:321: 'khril pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas /
NK080(wu)018:322: bdag nyid mnyes bas mnyes par bya /
NK080(wu)018:325: h+aum gis sgo phyed pas bde ba nyams su myong nas kyang dgug cing slar bgyil lo //
NK080(wu)018:326: tha mar zad pa med pa'i rgya mtsho las gzhal
NK080(wu)018:327: yas khang gi phyi khyams su sangs rgyas bzhi bcu
NK080(wu)018:328: rtsa gnyis dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la /
NK080(wu)018:329: slob dpon sku skyod de phata phyung bas sgo phye ba dang /
NK080(wu)018:330: g.yas pa rdo rjes sko bcad la slob bu brda'i sa bos te /
NK080(wu)018:331: h+aum nga ni rgyal ba kun gyis bla /
NK080(wu)018:333: mtheb srin gyis rta babs la bkug pa ste /
NK080(wu)018:334: lha kun kyang rdo rje sems dpa' gyur ba de /
NK080(wu)018:335: ljags rdo rje rtse lnga pas blangs te slob bu'i lce la bstim mo //
NK080(wu)018:336: de tsam na dus gsum gyi chos thams cad dang /
NK080(wu)018:337: khams gsum gyi sems can kun dang /
NK080(wu)018:338: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad kyang bde ba chen
NK080(wu)018:339: po byang chub sems su gsal bas rgyal thabs spyi
NK080(wu)018:341: de la rdo rje rgyal po'i bsam pa ni /
NK080(wu)018:342: rdo rje sems dpa' dkar la mtshe ra ba nyungs 'bru tsam grangs med pa babs pas /
NK080(wu)018:343: 'od kyis lus ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags thams cad bsregs pas /
NK080(wu)018:344: lus chos nyid la sems ye shes su gsal ba dang /
NK080(wu)018:345: snying chos kyi 'khor lo na rtsa 'dab brgyad yod te /
NK080(wu)018:350: de la chos nyid kyi rtsa la 'od ser po cig yod pa la su dang tri gnas so //
NK080(wu)018:351: de la kun gzhi gnas so //
NK080(wu)018:352: ye shes kyi rtsa la 'od mthing kha'i nang na a dang ni gnas te /
NK080(wu)018:354: rang rgyud kyi rtsa la 'od dmar po'i nang na pre dang du gnyis yod de /
NK080(wu)018:355: de la nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas so //
NK080(wu)018:356: yon tan gyi rtsa la 'od dmar nag gi nang na gnyid gnas so //
NK080(wu)018:357: de la a dang ni gnyis dbugs kyi snyigs ma la rgyu /
NK080(wu)018:358: su tri gnyis rtsa'i snyigs ma la rgyu /
NK080(wu)018:359: pri du gnyis khrag gi snyigs ma la brgyu /
NK080(wu)018:360: rtsa de dag gi 'od ni ye shes rang gnas kyi rtsa dar dkar gyi skud pa'am /
NK080(wu)018:362: rta rnga bcur bshags pa tsam cig gis bzung nas gnas so //
NK080(wu)018:363: de'i nang nas khrag gi dngas ma mtshal co la ma bcag pa 'dra ba /
NK080(wu)018:364: dbugs kyi dngas ma gser sa 'og na gnas pa'i rlangs pa tsam zhig la /
NK080(wu)018:365: drod kyi dngas ma de 'od me long gi ngad tsam la /
NK080(wu)018:366: lnga 'dus ni 'od kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dkyil na /
NK080(wu)018:367: byang chub kyi sems spros pa med pa'i thig le /
NK080(wu)018:368: tshogs brgyad gang yang ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku bzhugs so //
NK080(wu)018:369: de la rdo rje rgyal po'i bsam pa ni rdo
NK080(wu)018:370: rje sems dpa'i 'od kyis yi ge drug bsregs pas
NK080(wu)018:371: shes pa gsum gnyid dang bcas pa /
NK080(wu)018:372: ye shes 'od du gyur pa de /
NK080(wu)018:373: ma h+aa su ka la 'dus pas /
NK080(wu)018:374: de nyid cir yang ma grub ste /
NK080(wu)018:375: bdag bskyed thams cad dang bral bas /
NK080(wu)018:376: ye shes bla ma'i sa non par bsam mo //
NK080(wu)018:377: de nyid h+aum dkar la 'tsher ba gcig tu gyur pa las /
NK080(wu)018:378: h+aum thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings /
NK080(wu)018:379: zhes pa'i yi ge'i 'bru ma bcom ste /
NK080(wu)018:380: sngags dang bcas pa brjod pas /
NK080(wu)018:381: slob bu che mchog tu bskyed pa ni gsang ba ste /
NK080(wu)018:383: de la lung sum 'gyur khro bo'i rgyan thams cad kyang rdzogs par bsgom /
NK080(wu)018:384: de nas thig le dbul te /
NK080(wu)018:385: slob bu'i thig le khrus dang mdzes par brgyan par dbul lo //
NK080(wu)018:386: de slob dpon gyis kyang rang gi yum bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te /
NK080(wu)018:387: sngon bzhin du sbyor ba rdo rje rtse lnga la zla ba la phata yod pa /
NK080(wu)018:388: dbyings phyug gi rtsa la reg te /
NK080(wu)018:389: ma bsgyil bar spros la gnang ba thob pa dang /
NK080(wu)018:390: don dam pa'i lte ba dang zla tshes gnyis kyi
NK080(wu)018:391: dbus su thig le gcig gsang ba'i rtsa spubs su
NK080(wu)018:392: bsams la / ye shes bgyings te thig le rtsa sbubs la phog par spro'o //
NK080(wu)018:393: lhag ma gzhal yas khang gi khyams la yod pa'i mtheb srin gyis thig le nyid dbang bskur te /
NK080(wu)018:394: slob bu'i thabs kyi gung mo dang /
NK080(wu)018:395: thig le shes rab kyi gung mo lto sbyar ba rin chen bcings pa'i mdo /
NK080(wu)018:396: slob dpon gyi mtheb srin gyis bzung la /
NK080(wu)018:397: bde ba chen po chos kyi sku /
NK080(wu)018:399: tshig de'i don bshad pa dang /
NK080(wu)018:400: de shes nas slob bu'i snying khar rdo rje dril bu bzhibs te bzung la /
NK080(wu)018:401: mi 'gyur ces pa'i bden tshig brjod /
NK080(wu)018:402: de nas rdzogs pa bshad de /
NK080(wu)018:403: sbyor ba ni ye shes rang gnas zhes bya ba bshad te bstan /
NK080(wu)018:404: 'di nyams su ma lon pa ye shes rang gnas kyi dbang thob cing yod par ma gsungs so //
NK080(wu)018:406: de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des //
NK080(wu)018:407: rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus //
NK080(wu)018:408: bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu gces dang yid mthad dbul //
NK080(wu)018:409: ces 'byung bas de'i don bkrol la yon dbul lo //
NK080(wu)018:410: de lta bu'i slob bu yis las su bya ba'i man ngag bstan pa ni /
NK080(wu)018:411: spyir gzugs can gyi sems can thams cad la /
NK080(wu)018:412: rang byung gi dkyil 'khor chen po drug rang chas su gnas te /
NK080(wu)018:413: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa gang zhe na /
NK080(wu)018:414: mgo bo'i rtsa rig pad ma'i 'dab ma ldan pa
NK080(wu)018:415: g.yas na bcu drug g.yas pa'i 'od skye'i 'phar rtsar
NK080(wu)018:416: 'dus / de mthur du babs pa la /
NK080(wu)018:417: la la na rdo rje dril chu'i rtsa'o //
NK080(wu)018:418: g.yon bcu drug gi mdo g.yon pa'i 'phar rtsa mthur du babs pas ra sa na ste rak+ta'i rtsa'o //
NK080(wu)018:419: dbus thig le chen po nyid chos kyi sku zla ba rgyas pa lta bu las /
NK080(wu)018:420: tshangs pa'i rtsa rtogs pa'i gnas dang bcas pa mthur
NK080(wu)018:421: du byung ba ni a ba 'du ti kha ste
NK080(wu)018:423: sangs rgyas dang sems can gyi gter yin bar basngagasa so //
NK080(wu)018:424: de yang chod 'khor lo dang po lam dang bcas par bstan to //
NK080(wu)018:425: gnyis pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo ni /
NK080(wu)018:427: pad ma'i ldan pa phyogs cig gi cha ste bcu
NK080(wu)018:428: drug go /de dag la skyes pa ni rang bzhin
NK080(wu)018:429: mkhas 'gro ma rnam par zhes bya ste /
NK080(wu)018:430: cir yang gnas pa med longs spyod thams cad la rol ba ni lce ste /
NK080(wu)018:431: phyin nang kun brda sprod par byed pas khyab ma zhes kyang bya gsungs so //
NK080(wu)018:432: gsum pa chos kyi 'khor lo ni /
NK080(wu)018:434: snying dkar po ni zla ba ste thabs /
NK080(wu)018:435: dmar ba ni nyi ma ste shes rab /
NK080(wu)018:436: snying la shi ra nyid 'dab ma brgyad do //
NK080(wu)018:437: de brgyad dang rtsa bzhir 'dus ste /
NK080(wu)018:447: bya gag gi lkog zhol lta dmar nag go /sa
NK080(wu)018:448: bon ni yi ge drug go /de la gnas pa
NK080(wu)018:449: ni / ser po la kun gzhi skad cig ma gnas so //
NK080(wu)018:450: mthing kha la yid gnas so //
NK080(wu)018:451: dmar po la nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas so //
NK080(wu)018:452: dmar nag la gnyid gnas so //
NK080(wu)018:453: rtsa de rnams kyi mdo ni /
NK080(wu)018:454: ye shes snying po'i mkha' zhes bya ste /
NK080(wu)018:455: ba thag brkyang ba 'dra ba de ni yum gyi mkha' ste /
NK080(wu)018:456: lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i ye shes so //
NK080(wu)018:457: de'i nang na khrag gi dwangs ma mtshal co la
NK080(wu)018:458: ma bcag pa 'dra ba ni mi 'gyur sku ste
NK080(wu)018:459: me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
NK080(wu)018:460: de la dbugs kyi dngas ma gser sa 'og na yod pa'i rlangs pa tsam zhig yod pa ni /
NK080(wu)018:461: ma bsgrubs pa'i ye shes te /
NK080(wu)018:462: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
NK080(wu)018:463: de 'od kha dog sna tshogs pa yod pa ni ma btsal ba'i don te /
NK080(wu)018:464: cir yang sa ler mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
NK080(wu)018:465: de'i nang na byang chub kyi sems spros pa med
NK080(wu)018:466: pa'i thig le tshogs brgyad gang yang ma yin pa'i
NK080(wu)018:467: ngo bo nyid kyi sku bzhugs pa ni /
NK080(wu)018:468: dper na gser gyi sbug gur rin po che'i ze 'bru bcug pa 'dra ba /
NK080(wu)018:469: phyi nang med par gsal ba de ni rang byung gi ye shes kyang bya /
NK080(wu)018:470: mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po zhes kyang bya'o //
NK080(wu)018:471: de ni rdzogs pa chen po'i rdzogs pa bya rtsol dang bral ba'o //
NK080(wu)018:472: gtan tshig de'i phyir snying la chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
NK080(wu)018:473: sprul pa bgye ba'i 'khor lo ni //
NK080(wu)018:474: sems can gang yang rung ste //
NK080(wu)018:475: yan lag lnga la dur khrod lnga //
NK080(wu)018:476: mtshan ma la dur khrod gcig /nang khrol la dur
NK080(wu)018:477: khrod gcig /lus snying dang bcas pa la dur khrod
NK080(wu)018:478: gcig ste / brgyad po de kun gcig tu bsdus pa'i rtsa du zhe na /
NK080(wu)018:479: bcu phrag drug dang gyen mthur gyi rtsa che ba bzhi /
NK080(wu)018:480: mdo phran bzhi ste drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
NK080(wu)018:481: de dag lte ba nas spros na /
NK080(wu)018:485: sems gzugs med pa'i khams gsum la khyab pas sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste /
NK080(wu)018:486: de dag gi mdo ni len pa med pa'i rtsa zhes bya ste /
NK080(wu)018:487: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dbugs kyang de ru rgyu'o //
NK080(wu)018:488: de bas na len pa med pa'i dbugs la mi
NK080(wu)018:489: g.yo ba'i mkha' 'gro ma zhes bud med kyi rgyud
NK080(wu)018:490: la bshad do // lnga pa me'i 'khor lo ni /
NK080(wu)018:491: sprul pa nas mar thabs kyi phyag gsum dang gcig bor ba man chad te /
NK080(wu)018:492: yul yangs dog ni phyag rgya bzhi'o //
NK080(wu)018:493: dbyings phyug ma'i sna rtse dang mnyam por gnas pas spor ma zhes bya'o //
NK080(wu)018:494: gru gsum logs gsum te drug go /mtha' dbus kyi cha gnyis te spor ma brgyad do //
NK080(wu)018:495: drag po ni gru gsum gyi barda'o //
NK080(wu)018:496: drug pa rlung gi 'khor lo ni /
NK080(wu)018:497: thabs kyi yi ge las rlung bcu bshad na /
NK080(wu)018:499: de la stod kyi rlung ni brdam pa'o //
NK080(wu)018:500: smad kyi rlung ni g.yo ba ste /
NK080(wu)018:501: de'i dbyings ni za hor gyi gzhu 'dom bkug pa 'dra ba'o //
NK080(wu)018:502: mgo bo sbrul lta bu la /
NK080(wu)018:503: sna la ba dan sbrul lce lta bu yod pa /
NK080(wu)018:504: chang pa'i dkyil gyi gu ba na yi ge yam dmar skya rang bzhin gyis yod pa'o //
NK080(wu)018:505: rlung 'di'i las ni goms pa 'bor ba dang /
NK080(wu)018:506: pho mo'i sa bon 'byin pa dang /
NK080(wu)018:508: gshang lci 'byin pa'i las byed do //
NK080(wu)018:509: gal te rlung 'di med na las de kun 'gag go //
NK080(wu)018:510: yul ni phyag rgya brgyad do //
NK080(wu)018:511: rgyu ba ni lte ba nas /
NK080(wu)018:512: rkang mthil yan chad du rgyu'o //
NK080(wu)018:513: de las dang po pas yi ge yam gi bskyed do //
NK080(wu)018:514: sbar nas rtsa na 'khor lo dang dur khrod kun
NK080(wu)018:515: ma h+aa su ka la 'dzud pa'i dus na rtum
NK080(wu)018:516: mo zhes bud med kyi rgyud las bshad do //
NK080(wu)018:517: 'di nas mar ye shes dbab cing dgug pa'i thabs mdo tsam zhig bstan te /
NK080(wu)018:518: don dam pa'i sa phyag rgya gcig la zla ba
NK080(wu)018:519: tshes pa gnyis gyen mthur du kha sbyar ba'i bar
NK080(wu)018:520: du kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems nyid chos
NK080(wu)018:521: kyi sku dang tha mi dad pa nyungs kar che
NK080(wu)018:522: ba'i tshad tsam du bsgom pa ni dbab sa gcig
NK080(wu)018:523: go // rkyang pa zhes pa don dam pa'i phyag rgya phyed /
NK080(wu)018:524: sems sngon lta bu'i 'od la yang mi gnas par
NK080(wu)018:525: sgom pa ni zla ba drug gis snang ba thob
NK080(wu)018:526: te / de ltar sprul pa'i 'khor lo la thabs gnyis so //
NK080(wu)018:527: chos kyi 'khor lo la mkha' 'gro ma med pa'i pad+ma can dang /
NK080(wu)018:529: brgyad kyi mdo ye shes snying po'i rtsa la ma h+aa su ka nyi ma ltar dmigs pa ni /
NK080(wu)018:530: khams gsum kun dang dga' ba'i snang bas dag pa ste thabs gsum mo //
NK080(wu)018:531: de nyid las thig le skul ba ni myur ba'i thabs te bzhi pa'o //
NK080(wu)018:532: de la sogs pa ye shes dgug pa'i thabs mtha' yas pa kun ni /
NK080(wu)018:533: snang ba thob kyang dngos grub chen pos shin tu dbul ba ste /
NK080(wu)018:534: log pa'i lam du bltung ba yang mang mod /
NK080(wu)018:535: de dag ni rdzogs pa'i bskyed rims so //
NK080(wu)018:536: bud med kyi rgyud las ni thabs dam par bzhag pa'o //
NK080(wu)018:537: da ni rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pa bstan te /
NK080(wu)018:538: rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyi yum de yon tan gyi tshad bcu gsum rdzogs pas /
NK080(wu)018:539: mthong ba tsam gyis snang ba thob pa'i yid g.yo ba'o //
NK080(wu)018:540: yi ge med pa ni a de /
NK080(wu)018:541: chos nyid rtogs pa ni nyon mongs ma yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin du ldan pa ste /
NK080(wu)018:542: 'di ma shes par dngos grub thob tu re ba
NK080(wu)018:543: ni nam mkha' khu tshur gyis sod du re ba
NK080(wu)018:544: dang 'dra'o // rdo rje ma'i sna ba skul ba ni /
NK080(wu)018:545: h+aum phata la ltos pa ma yin te /
NK080(wu)018:546: mkhyud pa'i gar gsum dang po thob tsam na /
NK080(wu)018:548: rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i dang po pa ste tha ma'o //
NK080(wu)018:549: rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab gang yin kyang /
NK080(wu)018:550: sku stag phru gu bsgyug pa ltar byas te /
NK080(wu)018:551: sku stod kyi rlung 'phro 'du gang gi dus su phyin kyang rung ste /
NK080(wu)018:552: bcu drug gi 'khor lo la phyad par bcad te /
NK080(wu)018:553: de kho na nyid gsang sgo nus tshad bsdam /
NK080(wu)018:554: yang dal bar bzhag pa ni /
NK080(wu)018:556: de nyid las dbu ma'i 'khor lo phyed ni /
NK080(wu)018:557: ci yang ma yin pas 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa gnyis ka dang bral bas te /
NK080(wu)018:558: yi ge de yang brtson 'grus kyis bsdom pa ni gsang sgo bsdom pa ste /
NK080(wu)018:559: de dga' ba thob pa ni /
NK080(wu)018:560: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba yang yin la /
NK080(wu)018:561: sa gsum gyi dang po kun tu 'od kyi sa yang yin pas thob bar nus shes bya'o //
NK080(wu)018:562: de'i phyir rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pa ni yi ge phra mo dang sku gang yang mi rten pas /
NK080(wu)018:563: thabs chen po'i bya rtsol dang bral ba zhes bya'o //
NK080(wu)018:564: de yan chad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan kun btsal
NK080(wu)018:565: mi dgos pas rdzogs pa chen po zhes smos so
NK080(wu)018:566: // de'i phyir rgyu 'bras kyi chos kun rdzogs par rgyud las smos so //
NK080(wu)018:567: de na mar yi ge'i 'bru ma bkrol lo //
NK080(wu)018:568: dbang gi gal po'i mdo 'grel rdzogs so ////khri dang 'bum las gcig 'gal 'byung pa las //
NK080(wu)018:569: man ngag rdzogs pa'i dbang bskur bya phyin bkrol //
NK080(wu)018:570: gsum las mngas na rdo rje dmyal bar bltung //
NK080(wu)018:571: 'das na rdo rje sems dpa'i nyid kyang 'tshig /gter du bcang ngo //
NK080(wu)018:572: rtsa 'grel gnyis ka sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad //
